Physical Therapy in Carmel Valley

5550 Carmel Mountain Road, Suite 208B
San Diego, CA 92130

Phone: (858) 755-5200 | Fax: (858) 314-9611

The most recent RISE Physical Therapy office is located inside of our RISE Prime Wellness affiliate in Carmel Valley. This location provides patients a unique opportunity to experience the benefits of cyrotherapy and yoga, as well as receive industry-leading physical therapy in San Diego.
